sapphire_firstMeet_closed_0: I'm telling you for the last time Carmen, I am NOT asking them!
sapphire_firstMeet_closed_1: Just because my parents are well off doesn't mean they can just do whatever they desire! We have a reputation to uphold!

sapphire_firstMeet_closed_4: Do we have to talk about this today...? Can't we just relax for this moment?

carmen_firstMeet_closed_0: They have all that money and yet choose to do nothing with it, what's even the point?

carmen_rebuttal_closed_0: But there has to be a better way!
carmen_rebuttal_closed_1: What if it had taken us a few more years to meet each other?
